name: Dimsum
description: We serve a wide selection of both traditional and modern dimsum. If you come in the morning, you can enjoy most dimsum dishes served warm and fresh from heated dimsum carts. Some most popular dishes are still available in the afternoon until 4:00pm, or can be ordered to-go.
